revised_title: Multidisciplinary Approaches to Understanding Biological Membrane Structures
tldr: This article discusses a two-day discussion meeting that focused on the structures of selected biological membranes and envelopes with distinct morphological substructures. The meeting aimed to demonstrate the importance of a multidisciplinary approach to understanding membrane morphology and physiology. The papers presented highlight the major advances in membrane research and the need for collaboration between structural biologists, biochemists, and cell physiologists.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Cell Biology
